                   CourseNotes courseNotes,
                   int userId)
            throws ClassicDatabaseException,
                   ClassicNotFoundException,
                   ClassicUnauthorizedException
        Add course notes
        Parameters:
        parentId - id of course or lecture this video belongs to
        courseNotes - the courseNotes to add
        Returns:
        the id of the created courseNotes

        ClassicDatabaseException

      • addAllPdfComments

        java.lang.String addAllPdfComments(CourseNotes courseNotes,
                                   java.util.List<Comment> comments,
                                   boolean annotations,
                                   boolean questions)
        Creates a 'converted' pdf file, which is a new pdf file with all its comments added to it with iText.
        Parameters:
        courseNotes - The file you want to annotate
        comments - The list of comments for the courseNotes file (this should already be checked)
        annotations - whether or not annotations should be added to the pdf
        questions - whether or not questions should be added to the pdf
        Returns:
        url of the converted pdf file

      • addPdfComment

        void addPdfComment(java.lang.String outputFile,
                   Comment comment,
                   CourseNotesReference cnref)
        Adds a single comment to the output pdf file 'courseNote'
        Parameters:
        outputFile - the url of the new pdf, which will be returned to the user
        comment - the comment that iText should add
        cnref - the reference to be added
